name: cashscript-workshop
description: A comprehensive 2-day workshop covering Bitcoin Cash smart contracts using Cashscript, from fundamentals to practical implementation with Quasar Framework

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:contracts && npm run setup:quasar
scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:quasar
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf contracts/node_modules && rm -rf quasar-apps/*/node_modules
scripts.workshop:start: echo 'Starting Cashscript Workshop...' && npm run present
scripts.workshop:help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm run present     - Start presentation server' && echo '  npm run dev         - Start development server with live reload' && echo '  npm run setup       - Install all dependencies' && echo '  npm run test        - Run contract tests' && echo '  npm run build       - Build all projects'

author: Cashscript Workshop Team
